EmailTemplate.subject: TPA Summit recap: Virtual care trends to watch
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Virtual care in an evolving healthcare landscape After more than 20 years in virtual care, we’ve seen a lot of trends come and go. During our recent Virtual Partner Summit we heard from Nicola Merryman, Vice President of Commercial Strategy at Teladoc Health, on the role virtual care plays in addressing some of the most immediate challenges facing our employer clients, such as: • A major uptick in the need for primary care • Outcomes becoming the rule, not the exception • More emphasis on providing high-quality, safe healthcare
• A decline in digital health point solutions About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
